```{r}
#| include: false
#| echo: false

resource_grid = function(content) {
  div(class = "grid grid-three",
    pmap(content, function(category, name, icon, url, text) {
      div(class = "grid__item",
        h3(class = "grid__title",
          tags$i(class = sprintf("bi-%s grid__title-icon", icon)),
          HTML("&nbsp;"),
          name
        ),
        p(
        paste0(text, "."),
        a(href = url, "aria-label" = sprintf("Go to %s", name), span(class = "grid__link-box"))
        )
      )
    })
  )
}
# Text description should be one sentence
content = rowwise_table(
  ~category, ~name, ~icon, ~url, ~text,
  "general", "Email list", "envelope-plus", "emails/index.html", "Request use of AP-LS Email list.",
  "general", "Job postings", "briefcase", "job-postings/index.html", "List of job opportunities related to law-psychology",
  "general", "Newsletter", "newspaper", "newsletter/index.html", "Archive of previous issues",
  "general", "Students", "question-circle", "https://www.apls-students.org/resources.html", "Collection of information for students",
  "general", "AP-LS Videos", "file-earmark-play", "videos/index.html", "Collection of webinars, talks and videos.",
  "general", "Syllabi", "table", "syllabi/index.html", "Collection of syllabi for courses related to psychology and law.",
  "general", "Telepsychology", "telephone", "telepsychology/telepsychology.html", "Collection of articles and resources about telepsychology",
  "general", "Reports", "folder", "reports/index.html", "Access reports by AP-LS committees and taskforces.", 
  "general", "Forensic Guidelines", "file-earmark-ruled", "guidelines/index.html", "Specialty Guidelines for Forensic Psychologists from APA",
  "general", "Pets of AP-LS", "emoji-heart-eyes", "pets/index.html", "Gallery of pets")
setkeyv(content, "category")
```
